speaker: SPEAKER_03
transcription: A

speaker: SPEAKER_03
transcription: I work on Saturdays and in the school holidays.

speaker: SPEAKER_03
transcription: Saturdays are busy because that's when everyone goes shopping.

speaker: SPEAKER_03
transcription: Our shop sells clothes and accessories for men, women and children.

speaker: SPEAKER_03
transcription: I work in the children's department.

speaker: SPEAKER_03
transcription: It can be crazy sometimes, but it's fun.

speaker: SPEAKER_04
transcription: B.

speaker: SPEAKER_04
transcription: I work during my summer holidays when I'm not at university.

speaker: SPEAKER_04
transcription: Oxford has thousands of tourists in the summer, so it's easy to find a job as a tour guide.

speaker: SPEAKER_04
transcription: I take tourists to visit the university colleges and then we go down to the river.

speaker: SPEAKER_04
transcription: We go along the river on a boat.

speaker: SPEAKER_04
transcription: The tourists love the boat trip.

speaker: SPEAKER_04
transcription: But last summer, Huang tourists fell in the river.

speaker: SPEAKER_04
transcription: I love meeting people from all over the world.

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: C.

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: I like my job.

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: But lots of people don't like coming to see me because...

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: They hate dentists.

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: Sometimes it's very hard work.

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: But it's great to help people when they have a problem.

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: It's so important to look after your teeth.

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: D.

speaker: SPEAKER_02
transcription: My job is very difficult, but I like it because I love flying. I fly planes that take people to different places on holiday. Most of the time I fly in Europe to places like Spain, Greece and Italy. The most difficult thing about my job is when the weather is bad. Snow and thunderstorms are the worst. The best thing is visiting different places.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: E.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: I work in a hospital in the city centre.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: It's a very big hospital.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: I help the doctors with the patients.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: I give them their medicine and look after them when they feel ill.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: I love my job.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: But.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: I don't like the uniform.

speaker: SPEAKER_01
transcription: and sometimes I have to work at night.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
transcription: This recording was brought to you by the British Council.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
transcription: To find others like it...
